title: Whistle rattle
description:
Marks: Anchor (?) town mark of Birmingham; Lion passant (?) standard mark; Sovereign\'s head or duty mark (used 1784-1890)
Date letter
Initials of silversmith, 7 total (one on each bell)
Note: The marks indicate that it is English.  If so, it was probably done by Joseph Taylor (see page. 197, Old Silver).  Two American silversmiths have the same maker\'s mark: John Tanner (c.1740) from Newport, Rhode Island and Jacob Ten Eych (1725-1793) from Albany, New York.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. William C. Dean
